name: Moebius
description: "MOEBIUS is the world’s first text-based gamefi project launched on BSC, featuring life loops and LOOT 2.0. · P2E: Players can earn while they play. The value of players’ attention and time is converted into revenue. · Strategy: Different equipment and mastery cards matching can lead to more experience and benefit in the game. · Free trading of props: players’ assets such as equipment and mastery cards in the game can be traded freely in the market · Metaverse: Players have a chance to obtain the Life Mark NFT at the end of each game; in addition to staking for profit and trading, the Mark NFT can be used in other new projects in the Moebius metaverse."
